44.ara-name: كتاب الأمثال عن رسول الله صلى الله عليه وسلم

hadiths.text: Narrated Ibn 'Umar:that the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) said: "Indeed there is a tree that does not shed its foilage, and it is is similar to the believer. Can any of you tell me what it is?" 'Abdullah said: "The people started thinking about the trees of the desert. And it occurred to me that it may be the date-palm." Then the Prophet (ﷺ) said: "It is the date-palm." But I was shy - meaning to say anything." 'Abdullah said: "So I informed 'Umar about what I had thought of, and he said: 'If you had said it, that would be more beloved to me than this or that

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي مَثَلِ الْمُؤْمِنِ الْقَارِئِ لِلْقُرْآنِ وَغَيْرِ الْقَارِئِ
chapter.eng-name: What Has Been Related About The Parable Of The Believer Who Recites The Quran And The One Who Does Not Recite
